summary: DRIVERS SEAT DOES NOT LATCH PROPERLY , WAS TAKEN INTO DEALER AND WASN'T FIXED PROPERLY. REAR DEFROST DOES NOT  WORK  WAS TAKEN INTO DEALER AND WAS TOLD THAT IT WORKED BECAUSE THE LIGHT ON THE SWITCH TURNS ON BUT  IT STILL DOES NOT DEFROST,  FRONT BRAKES MAKE SQUEALING NOISE  MUST PUT NEW BRAKE PADS ON  EVERY  2 MONTHS  BECAUSE THE ROTORS GET TOO HOT AND THE  PADS  GET GLAZED , CAR HAS BEEN TAKEN IN AT LEAST TWICE FOR EACH OF THESE  AND THE PROBLEMS STILL ARE NOT FIXED.  *NLM
